message: I propose a split of $6000 for me and $4000 for you. Let's agree on this fair division.
I'm willing to split the money 60/40 in your favor, but I'll need to see a more even split if we want to reach an agreement.
Considering inflation, I think it's fair to split the money equally now. This way, both of us receive $5000, ensuring stability in our shares.
